title: Announcing .NET MAUI in .NET 8 Preview 5
description: .NET MAUI in .NET 8 Preview 5 is now available with lots of bug fixes and performance improvements for cross-platform app development.

title: Apple Introduces SwiftData, a SwiftUI-Ready Core Data Replacement
description: SwiftData can easily make a Swift class into a persistent model and is especially suited to be used with SwiftUI.

title: Public Preview : Improve Win32 app security via app isolation
Read a barcode with Zebra terminals, using DataWedge and .NET MAUI
description: This article would like to resume an article already written for Xamarin Forms (Xamarin Android and DataWedge scanning process), on how to integrate barcode reading in a MAUI application on Zebra android terminals.

title: Report Surfaces DevOps Challenges for Mobile Applications
description: An assessment of 1,600 DevOps teams involved in building and deploying mobile applications found that 62% were adversely impacted by manual processes that slowed the rate at which these applications were deployed and updated.

title: What to Know When Porting a WPF App to .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid
description: Your WPF app can gain more users if you make it cross-platform, but what’s the best way to do that—with .NET MAUI or Blazor Hybrid? Here are the steps involved if the results show Blazor Hybrid.

title: Xamarin Forms Migration to Uno Platform: Effects and Alternative Approaches
description: This article delves into the concept of Effects, a valuable tool for making smaller customizations to native controls.
